sentence: That guy's going to sit down there and bag on me, and he has actually done nothing in his life except for what somebody has told him to do?? Luttrell has the support of Rep. Dan Crenshaw (R) and former governor Rick Perry, both political mentors, while Collins rallied during the early-voting period with Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-Ga.) and Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.).
title: Texas rings the starting bell of the midterm primary season

sentence: At a recent rally for Mr. Collins, Representatives Marjorie Taylor Greene of Georgia and Madison Cawthorn of North Carolina made clear that their support for Mr. Collins was about opposition to the existing political order in Washington.
title: A Sneak Peek at the Country's Midterm Battles: Primary Day in Texas

sentence: Greene and North Carolina Rep. Madison Cawthorn are also opposing GOP leadership in the race to replace retiring GOP Rep. Kevin Brady in Texas' 8th District.
author: Gregory Krieg
title: Texas attorney general's race and other state primaries offer early tests for 2022
